Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Maximize the overall availability of all team members

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the total budget spent on the project

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the total priority of features delivered

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the total severity of active blockers

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of the team

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of sprint goals

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort of all tasks in the sprint

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the satisfaction level from sprint reviews (modeled via attendees)
